item.title: History of the Winter Olympics
item.ExtractedText: By Tom McGowan , CNN September 19, 2013 -- Updated 1135 GMT (1935 HKT) Editor's note:Sochi 2014 is less than six months away. To celebrate the launch of CNN's Aiming for Gold series, we take a look back through the history of the Winter Olympics.
